name: Virtual Boyfriend Dressup Fever - My Fun Glam Fashion Dress Up Game With Justin for Kids And Girls One Direction Version FREE
name_original: Virtual Boyfriend Dressup Fever - My Fun Glam Fashion Dress Up Game With Justin for Kids And Girls One Direction Version FREE
description:
****** Free Boyfriend Dress Up Game! *********

***** Hours of mix-n’-matching delight ********

Tired of sloppy boys without a sense of style and fashion? Have you ever wanted to raid your boyfriend’s wardrobe?

If so, you’ll totally enjoy this fun dress-up game that is so addicting you won’t be able to put it down. With this game, you finally get the chance to show what you got to make your boyfriend look awesome!

With a huge variety of fashionable jackets, shirts, ties, scarves, sunglasses and more, you can style up endless variations of different looks. This game brings you the coolest apparel you can choose from which gives your boyfriend a different look: smart, cute, handsome or whatever else you like! Now you can create any styles you like to express your fashion talent.

Everyone deserves a new, fabulous look.

Features:

* Tons of BEAUTIFUL dresses!!
* Endless variations and looks
* High quality animations!
* Fun for ALL ages!

Design away and Express your Style!

Download FREE Today!
